instructions.instruction: Bundle-Name: %pluginName Bundle-ClassPath: bin/,.,lib/json_simple/json_simple-1.1.jar Bundle-Version: 0.1.0.200906231646 Eclipse-LazyStart: true Bundle-Activator: org.chromium.debug.core.ChromiumDebugPlugin Bundle-Vendor: %providerName Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.core.filesystem;bundle-version="1.2.0",org.eclipse.debug.ui;bundle-version="3.4.1",org.eclipse.ui;bundle-version="3.4.1",org.eclipse.jface.text;bundle-version="3.4.1",org.eclipse.ui.workbench.texteditor;bundle-version="3.4.1",org.chromium.sdk;bundle-version="0.1.0" Export-Package: org.chromium.debug.core,org.chromium.debug.core.model,org.chromium.debug.core.util,org.json.simple Bundle-SymbolicName: org.chromium.debug.core;singleton:=true Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Bundle-Localization: plugin
